queries.query_text: Summarize ARMOR UPGRADES
queries.query_text_short: Summarize ARMOR UPGRADES

queries.query_text: What is the rule about You can personalize armor by purchasing and installing armor  upgrades. Armor upgrades are installed into the upgrade slots  of armor; one armor upgrade occupies one armor upgrade slot.  The number of upgrade slots a specific suit of armor has is noted  under that armor's description. You can install an armor upgrade  with the Install Upgrade activity, which takes 10 minutes to  perform. Unlike many other types of equipment, armor upgrades  run on kinetic energy created by your body's motion, and they  don't need external batteries. They function only when installed  in armor you're wearing properly.?
queries.query_text_short: What is the rule about You can personalize armor by purchasing and installing armor  upgrades. Armor up?

queries.query_text: Summarize **INSTALL UPGRADE**
queries.query_text_short: Summarize **INSTALL UPGRADE**

queries.query_text: What is the rule about **Requirements** You must use a repair toolkit.?
queries.query_text_short: What is the rule about **Requirements** You must use a repair toolkit.?

queries.query_text: What is the rule about You spend 10 minutes installing an upgrade into a suit of armor  or weapon, placing it into an empty upgrade slot. You can also  use this activity to uninstall an upgrade. You can't install more  upgrades than there are upgrade slots. Installing or uninstalling  an upgrade requires using a repair toolkit with two hands.?
queries.query_text_short: What is the rule about You spend 10 minutes installing an upgrade into a suit of armor  or weapon, plac?

queries.query_text: What is the rule about ACTIVATING ARMOR UPGRADES?
queries.query_text_short: What is the rule about ACTIVATING ARMOR UPGRADES?

queries.query_text: What is the rule about Most upgrades grant their benefits continually so long as  you're properly wearing the armor they're installed in. Others  produce their effects only when used properly in the moment  by spending actions. An activation lists the number of actions  it takes and any traits for the activation and its effects. This  information appears in the item's Activate entry.?
queries.query_text_short: What is the rule about Most upgrades grant their benefits continually so long as  you're properly weari?

queries.query_text: Summarize LIMITED ARMOR UPGRADES
queries.query_text_short: Summarize LIMITED ARMOR UPGRADES

queries.query_text: What is the rule about Some armor upgrades that have special activations and benefits  can be activated only a limited number of times per day, as  described in the armor upgrade. This limit is independent of any  costs for activating the upgrade. This limit resets during your  daily preparations. The limit is inherent to the armor upgrade, so  if an ability that can be used only once per day is used, it doesn't  refresh if the armor upgrade is uninstalled and reinstalled or is  installed in another suit of armor, or if another creature tries to  activate the upgrade. Similarly, armor has innate safety overrides  that prevent you from installing a duplicate of an armor upgrade  you've already used the limited action of and from trying to use  that action again.?
queries.query_text_short: What is the rule about Some armor upgrades that have special activations and benefits  can be activated?

queries.query_text: Summarize ENVIRONMENTAL  PROTECTION UPGRADES
queries.query_text_short: Summarize ENVIRONMENTAL  PROTECTION UPGRADES

queries.query_text: What is the rule about Environmental protections are crucial tools for explorers and  combatants alike, allowing any species to operate in hostile  conditions ill-suited for its survival. These items function as long  as the armor's environmental protections (page 244) are active  and can quickly recharge while a character is resting as other  functions in an armor enter sleep mode.?

queries.query_text: What is the rule about Force fields absorb damage. A force field's Hit Points are based  on its version. While your force field is active, any physical or  energy damage you would take is applied to the force field's Hit  Points first before being applied to your Hit Points (including  temporary Hit Points). If you have a shield raised, your force  field and shield both take damage. If damage from an attack or  effect reduces the force field to 0 Hit Points, you take any excess  damage, the force field deactivates, and it can't be activated  again for 10 minutes. Force fields replenish the indicated number  of Hit Points each round at the beginning of your turn while  they're active.?
queries.query_text_short: What is the rule about Force fields absorb damage. A force field's Hit Points are based  on its version?

You can  copy the look of any type of clothing, but you don't gain any  item bonuses provided by special types of clothing, such as  luxury fashion attire.
